Prompt Cortex Settings

Configure your prompt library preferences and backup options

Import & Export

Export your prompts to a JSON file or import prompts from another installation.

Encryption

Encrypt your personal prompts with a passphrase. Seed prompts remain unencrypted. Warning: If you forget your passphrase, encrypted data cannot be recovered.

Seed Prompts

Seed prompts are built-in templates that provide a foundation for your prompt library. You can reload them to get the latest versions or reset to defaults.

Note: Reloading seeds will update existing seed prompts. Resetting will remove all seed prompts and reload them fresh.
